title: The Marvelous Mrs. Maisel Wears Many Hats in Season 3 Trailer
text: The full-length trailer for the third season of The Marvelous Mrs. Maisel is here, and it showcases Midge Maisel’s ability to wear many hats, both literally and figuratively. To start off with the literal hats: we have pillbox, we have Fez, we have Gatsby. Then, we have Midge’s considerable talents: her wit, her pluck, and, of course, her comedy, all of which she uses on tour with Shy Baldwin, played by Leroy McClain. The trailer also features glimpses of new guest stars played by the likes of Sterling K. Brown and Amy Sherman-Palladino show veteran Liza Weil, who tells Midge from behind a pair of cat-eye glasses that she’s not “having to go to [her] grave not having done anything interesting.” The trailer wraps up by reminding us just how many Emmys this show has won (the answer: a whole lot). Season three of The Marvelous Mrs. Maisel premieres on December 6 on Amazon Prime.
description: Trailer for ‘The Marvelous Mrs. Maisel’ Season 3 [VIDEO] includes Rachel Brosnahan, Jane Lynch, Tony Shalhoub, and Sterling K. Brown.
